weekly_top_story.headline: CMS Launches Initiative to Verify Citizenship and Immigration Status for Medicaid and CHIP Enrollees
weekly_top_story.summary: The Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services (CMS) announced a new oversight program to enhance verification of citizenship and immigration status for individuals enrolled in Medicaid and CHIP, aiming to reduce improper payments and increase program integrity.

stories.headline: Bariatric Surgery Linked to Improved IBD Outcomes in Patients With Obesity
stories.summary: A recent study found that bariatric surgery can improve inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) outcomes in patients with obesity, providing a potential new treatment avenue for this high-risk group.

stories.headline: Federal Judge Orders Halt to Health Department Sharing Medicaid Enrollee Data With Deportation Officials
stories.summary: A federal judge ruled that the health department must stop giving deportation officials access to personal information of all 79 million Medicaid enrollees, protecting patient privacy and trust.
